name: Mehtris (Kyle Latino)
description:
Mehtris v1.4  by Kyle Latino 

Controls

  • ESC: reset
  • A and D or left and right arrow: move mehtromino
  • S or down arrow: drop mehtromino
  • Mouse buttons or left CTRL and ALT: rotate mehtromino
  • 8:reset high score
  • O: play or pause creator commentary
  • 0: quit

Music by Claude Lavender from After Lunch, released November 2, 2022, all rights reserved. https://claudelavender.bandcamp.com/track/night-walk
